This cowgirl belt is so comfortable it provides that the stretchiness is and it’s super cute!
It holds up pants. The beading seems to be holding up and is not coming apart. The belt is quite rigid though, I'm hoping that with time it will mold more and have some give.

I have narrow hips, so no matter what size I am, pants have a habit of slipping down. Liked what I saw and decided to give this belt a try. Yes, it has a little bit of Urban Cowboy bling, but not over the top, so there is no risk of looking like a wannabe Country Rock Star. The vegan leather is nicely done as well. Glad it came with an awl, I may need to make use of it.

This is a great belt! It's not as flimsy as a lot of fashion belts tend to bit. The stones and studs are all securely attached, and it's very thick. Im a clumsy person, so this poor belt has to deal with a lot of abuse, but its held up well! It feels like real leather, but it is not real leather! I'm usually a size 4 (5'7", 135 lbs) pre holidays, I could use the 30-33" size on the middle hole. Post holidays, I've had to move it out one hole, but it fits me great still! The buckle is very sturdy and pretty; I love the look of the metal! This is definitely worth trying out; make sure you know your size though! It comes with a punch to make additional holes, but I can't imagine you could add too many more because of the studs!
I absolutely love this belt! Fits true to size and it's really comfortable to wear. Ordered for my restaurant job and it has held up so well over the past few months. Would order again!
Super cute belt. Comfortable to wear all day. Comes with a leather punch in case you need to make a new hole.

I’ve worn this belt so many times since I ordered it.  It’s very versatile and fits great.  It matches all my cowboy boots and jeans.  The flower pattern on the belt makes it feminine and pretty, while still functional.
This is a very pretty belt. It's just as pictured and is true to size. Very happy with this adorable belt

This is a very nicely styled belt. The fit is exactly as described. It comes complete with a hole punching tool, in case you need to add another hole, although it doesn’t seem like there’s any space for additional holes? Anyway, this is a lovely belt and I would definitely recommend it!
This belt is beautiful.  The embossing is really pretty and pronounced.  The floral pattern is very dainty and amazing.

This belt is perfect for everyday wear. The 1" width is a middle road between skinny and wide belt styles making it a fine choice for anytime. The belt pattern is a subtle classic western pattern without being flashy. The metal buckle, belt tip and keeper do look good but aren't as heavy duty as one might expect. We will see how they hold up over time. The hole punch that came with this belt is a welcome addition. I won't need it for this product but I'm happy to have it as a wardrobe tool for the future. It could be a lower price point but an overall winner.
Love the touch of bling this belt adds to plain old jeans and a t-shirt. Well made with plenty of holes for the perfect fit.
Thicker than it looks in the pictures, great for jeans or other pants with wide belt loops. Design is well made, doesn't look cheap, and best of all it keeps pants up!
Es de cuero y se ve delicada y elegante. El color es igual que en la foto y queda cómoda.

This belt gives off a nice western look. It’s not too bulky but not to small, although it is a little smaller than I expected. It still looks great for every day wear. It’s not high quality like you would get from an actual western store but it’s more affordable and still looks nice. It comes with a hole punch incase you get a size too big and need more holes which is very nice. Overall the belt fits the price listed and I hope it will last for awhile!
It’s a nice fancy belt. I like the exotic metal design.

My wife ordered this belt to wear with skirts and to cinch dresses. She really likes it and found it to be high quality. The size was much smaller than she expected, it was supposed to be for a 30" waist, but those are her measurements and it fit her on the second to last belt hole.

评论概述: This belt would be better for children than for adults!
评论详情: This belt does not have the feel of quality that my wife was expecting. It ran small in size so it did not fit well so she could not have worn it anyway. The "leather" does not look nor feel genuine and the hardware is light weight and looks cheap. We gave it to a 14 year old niece who absolutely loves it!!

评论概述: Great tooling pattern, love that it comes with a hole punch
评论详情: This is a lovely belt, with good tooling patterns and that fresh leather smell. I especially like the fact that it comes with a leather belt hole punch so you can make additional holes if you gain a little or lose a lot. The belt is well made, buckle fastened, and no hanging threads. It's a nice piece to add to your collection.
This is a very beautiful belt. I'm very happy with the quality of this product. It doesn't feel stiff when you put it on and looks really nice. The price is great too.
Beautiful design of the belt is what drew me to it. Looks better in person! Fit and feel is great 👍

I enjoy western style belts, saw this one and thought it would fit the bill. It's pretty nice, it feels good in the hand, feels like decent quality material and sizing is true. I'm a 6ft male, and this belt does says it's unisex. It feels a bit dainty and slim for my frame but it still works well.
Fits well. Looks great!

I'm normally about a size 12 (5'5" 170 lbs) and decided to order the XL and I'm glad I did. Had I ordered the L, it would've been too small. I thought this had rhinestones but they're actually just silver ball chain across top and bottom of belt. It is cute in design and print. There was a small silver rod that came with the belt, but I'm not exactly sure what it is for.
The hardware on the belt is very nice. The belt is soft and plush and generous fit. They call it a cowgirl belt but it would be totally cool for a dude, too .

This is a cute belt, it looks like a vintage 80’s belt which is what drew me in in the first place! It’s not real leather, it’s poly, but it’s soft and it’s a decent quality faux leather. It looks real enough, and the silver metal shines! It looks radical with some acid wash jeans, and I haven’t tried it out with those low  cut western shooties yet but that might be my next outfit. For real though, it’s a decent belt; idk how long it will hold up, but you’ll definitely get your money out of it!

评论概述: Cute, a little cheap feeling but looks great
评论详情: I'm attending a western themed party coming up and had no western attire so I ordered a couple things to make it work. This looks super cute on and fits well. I ordered the smallest size, it says 30 inches, but it fits me well. I wear a size 27 (or a 4) in jeans. There are holes all around the belt so it's highly adjustable.
Was a lot smaller than I expected but looked nice when I had to go to court. I can say that I highly recommend.
Cute western belt that is made well for the price.  It is lightweight and comfortable and fits as expected.  Great for jeans, buckle is well made and sturdy
Quality and detail is definitely there. Fits just right. Stylish and a statement belt

Its a decent product considering its low price, but it is very clearly fake leather. They didn't lie about this of course, it is stated that it is not genuine leather, but this is definitely some of the lower end PU leather I've seen. It appears and feels almost like molded plastic more than some kind of imitation leather/ leather substitute.

This is a nice belt. The beads on the side are sewn on but they feel secure. It's not a thick belt but it's nice and feels good for me(I don't like thick belts). It even comes with a tool to make more belt holes if it needs to be tighter.

评论概述: TOPACC Western Fashion Cowgirl Cowboy belt.  Cute cowgirl belt.
评论详情: TOPACC Western Fashion Cowgirl Cowboy beltReceived the Topacc cowgirl belt and it is a pretty good quality belt.  The buckle and metal parts are good quality and look great.  The belt itself is very soft.  It is not leather and that was expected as it is listed as a polyurethane material.  We will see how well it holds up over time but it is very nice and soft.  The style -03 in black ordered in the 30-32 was fine on fit.  Overall happy with the Topacc cowgirl belt.
Love the print and feel of this belt. Super cute and fit me well.
A very nice looking belt. Fits well and is a perfect match for western ensemble.
This belt is sturdy, and beautiful. The design is amazing. The buckle has some weight to it, but not so much that it’s bothersome. It’s great quality, and I look for reasons to wear it!

This belt is just so cute. It's very sturdy and smooth to the touch. Even the texture on the belt is smooth to the touch. The buckle is very sturdy, not loose at all, and has held up well to wear. Has kept its shape well over time and hasn't wrinkled or flaked with use.

In the description I had the choice between 32-33 or 34-36. It said they fit that size waist. I am generally a 32 or 34. The last belt I got was too long, but I went for the larger size anyway and boy was I glad I did because the belt is 36 inches long and would not fit a 36-inch waist. I can fit into the first hole. That is the only problem I have with it though. I had to go back and look at the ad because I thought it said it was not leather and sure enough the ad says it is synthetic. It fooled both of us though! I don't know how they did it, but it smells like real leather. It is soft and thick like a solid piece of real leather. I was surprised that the surface was porous, smooth, not furry. It's hard to tell in the picture. I really like this belt. It's my new favorite. Size up!
Is adjustable for all The buckle is attractive narrow belt
I like this belt but I don't think it will last as long as real leather belts.  [Review TOPACC Western Fashion Cowgirl Cowboy belts for Women Mens Jeans Pants Dresses]

评论概述: Took the advice of reviewers and sized up
评论详情: This particular belt style has holes built in to the entire belt, so it's pretty much one size fits almost all. I took the advice of reviewers and sized up, so I can even wear the belt with low rise jeans if I want to wear it around my hips.  It's a nice looking black belt with a pretty buckle and will probably be a staple in my closet since I have a lot of black boots. (I'm a matchy matchy girl when it comes to belts and boots, lol!)  Hope my review, pics and video helps you decide if this is the right belt for you! 😊
I love this belt. It feels really nice and of good quality. This is my new favorite belt!  If anything changes with this belt I will come back and update you.

评论概述: basic belt, plain with a little detail
评论详情: Needed a basic belt (no bling) for my daughter when she shows livestock.  For that reason this belt is good.  As far as quality, I wouldn't say it is the highest.  It felt and looks a bit cheap including the silver-like buckle because of that I would say it is priced a little high.  Sizing seems to be fine.
Cute and fashionable belt. Have not had king enough to know how well it holds up over time. It seems well made.

评论概述: Title misleading, PU leather, but nice buckle, a bit large
评论详情: Calls it "leather" in the title, but clarifies as polyurethane and "PU" leather in the details. It is an OK belt, but it does have that plastic feel. Buckle is nice though, and design is interesting, but it just doesn't look completely like a true "leather" belt.  Belt was a bit larger than expected. I ordered a medium which indicates it is for a 33"-35" waist. Overall length of the belt is about 45" and there are holes that will fit for a waist starting at 32" to 38", with a hole every inch. Style could be to have a lot of belt hanging over though?

To start in the pics it looks like the leopard print will be like fuzzy/fake fur from my point of view.  It is not, it is like a pleather.  I wasn't really wanting that look. With that being said,  the belt is very nice, well stitched and buckle and end are pretty and not cheap looking. It will definitely work for most all my black/white outfits.

The belt is made from high-quality leather and features intricate and eye-catching western-style engravings that give it a unique and stylish look.  The brown color is rich and versatile, making it easy to pair with any outfit. Whether I'm dressing up for a night out or keeping it casual for a day on the ranch, this belt always adds a touch of western flair to my look.  I was also impressed with the quality of the buckle and how well it stays secure throughout the day. I never have to worry about it coming undone or slipping down my hips.  Overall, I highly recommend the TOPACC Western Embossed Engraved Tooled Leather Belt. It's a stylish and durable accessory that will quickly become a staple in your wardrobe. Whether you're a cowgirl or just a fan of western style, this belt is a must-have.

I ordered the smallest size available for my wife (30-32).  She was concerned it might be too for large her waist size (27) but fits well, so these might run small in sizing.  It's a nice quality belt and she seems happy with it.  Looking at the product pictures we both thought it was going to be furry, but it instead has a textured surface.  I took some close-up pics to try and help show the texture (see pics).  It comes with a tool to punch more holes if needed which is a nice bonus.
